response.overview: Miss Vale (Little Puck) is a teacher infamous in school for her mean and strict personality. On this night, she is held back in class long after everybody else has gone home, grading her student’s essays. The only other person in the building is a school janitor (Tommy Pistol).  Unaware of an invasive creature entering her classroom, Miss Vale gets attacked by an alien parasite, forced to feel it slither down her throat. She bursts into the school toilets, succumbing to the parasite’s effects taking hold of her body.  Entering the restroom to continue his cleaning duties, the school janitor makes a horrifying discovery. A human-sized cocoon. He watches in utter shock as a naked female emerges from the cocoon, covered in dark bulging veins and wet slime. Barely recognizing her, it takes a moment for the janitor to realize that this infected woman is none other than Miss Vale.
response.title: The Parasite Queen
